sql-case.value: ALTER TYPE compfoo1 OWNER TO usr1
ALTER TYPE compfoo RENAME TO compfoo1;
ALTER TYPE compfoo1 SET SCHEMA usr1;
ALTER TYPE usr1.compfoo1 ADD ATTRIBUTE f3 int;
ALTER TYPE bugstatus ADD VALUE IF NOT EXISTS 'regress' BEFORE 'closed';
ALTER TYPE bugstatus RENAME VALUE 'create' TO 'new';
ALTER TYPE type_name
ALTER TYPE schema_name.type_name
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE DEBUG REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE SPECIFICATION REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE BODY REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE bool_variable = TRUE REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE bool_variable = FALSE REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE string_variable = 'String Value' REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE number_variable = +5 REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE number_variable = -5 REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE number_variable = +5.0 REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE number_variable = -5.0 REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name COMPILE hex_variable = X'11' REUSE SETTINGS
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, MEMBER FUNCTION p(n1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, STATIC FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, MEMBER PROCEDURE p(b1 BOOL))
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, STATIC PROCEDURE p(b1 BOOL))
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, STATIC PROCEDURE p(b1 BOOL) AS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName')
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, STATIC PROCEDURE p(b1 BOOL) IS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName')
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, OVERRIDING STATIC FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, FINAL STATIC FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, INSTANTIABLE STATIC FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, NOT INSTANTIABLE STATIC FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, CONSTRUCTOR FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN SELF AS RESULT)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, CONSTRUCTOR FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL, n1 NUMBER) RETURN SELF AS RESULT)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, FINAL CONSTRUCTOR FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN SELF AS RESULT)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, INSTANTIABLE CONSTRUCTOR FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN SELF AS RESULT)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, CONSTRUCTOR FUNCTION p(SELF IN OUT NUMBER, n1 NUMBER) RETURN SELF AS RESULT)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, CONSTRUCTOR FUNCTION p(SELF IN OUT NUMBER, n1 NUMBER) RETURN SELF AS RESULT AS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName')
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, CONSTRUCTOR FUNCTION p(SELF IN OUT NUMBER, n1 NUMBER) RETURN SELF AS RESULT IS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName')
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, MAP MEMBER FUNCTION p(n1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b NUMBER, ORDER MEMBER FUNCTION p(n1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER)
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, MEMBER FUNCTION p(c1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER , PRAGMA RESTRICT_REFERENCES (method_name, RNDS))
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, MEMBER FUNCTION p(c1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER , PRAGMA RESTRICT_REFERENCES (method_name, WNDS))
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, MEMBER FUNCTION p(c1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER , PRAGMA RESTRICT_REFERENCES (method_name, RNPS))
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, MEMBER FUNCTION p(c1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER , PRAGMA RESTRICT_REFERENCES (method_name, WNPS))
ALTER TYPE type_name REPLACE AS OBJECT (a NUMBER, b link1, MEMBER FUNCTION p(c1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER , PRAGMA RESTRICT_REFERENCES (method_name, TRUST))
ALTER TYPE type_name RESET
ALTER TYPE type_name ADD MAP MEMBER FUNCTION p(n1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER
ALTER TYPE type_name DROP MAP MEMBER FUNCTION p(n1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER
ALTER TYPE type_name ADD ORDER MEMBER FUNCTION p(n1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER
ALTER TYPE type_name DROP ORDER MEMBER FUNCTION p(n1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER
ALTER TYPE type_name ADD ORDER MEMBER FUNCTION p(n1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER AS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName'
ALTER TYPE type_name DROP ORDER MEMBER FUNCTION p(n1 NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER IS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName'
ALTER TYPE type_name ADD STATIC FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER
ALTER TYPE type_name ADD STATIC PROCEDURE p(b1 BOOL))
ALTER TYPE type_name ADD STATIC FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER AS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName'
ALTER TYPE type_name ADD STATIC PROCEDURE p(b1 BOOL)) IS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName'
ALTER TYPE type_name DROP STATIC FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER
ALTER TYPE type_name DROP STATIC PROCEDURE p(b1 BOOL))
ALTER TYPE type_name DROP STATIC FUNCTION p(b1 BOOL) RETURN NUMBER AS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName'
ALTER TYPE type_name DROP STATIC PROCEDURE p(b1 BOOL)) IS LANGUAGE JAVA NAME 'resultName'
